page.upgrade_notice: Upgrade requests are typically reviewed within 24-48 hours
page.faq_time_question: How long does the upgrade process take?
page.faq_time_answer: Most upgrade requests are reviewed within 24-48 hours. You'll receive an email notification once your request has been processed.
page.faq_info_question: What information do I need to provide?
page.faq_info_answer: We'll ask for basic information about your organization, your role, and why you'd like to upgrade. LinkedIn profile or portfolio links can help speed up the review process.
page.faq_downgrade_answer: Yes, you can request to change your account type at any time through your profile settings. Note that downgrading may affect your access to certain features.
